message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_RESERVATION_FROM_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_PLACE_START_DATE
message.locale: The reservation From date, %1d, must be on or after the place Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_RESERVATION_FROM_DATE_LATER_THAN_PLACE_END_DATE
message.locale: The reservation From date, %1d, must be on or before the place End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_RESERVATION_TO_DATE_LATER_THAN_PLACE_END_DATE
message.locale: The reservation To date, %1d, must be on or before the place End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_FROM_DATE_TIME_LATER_THAN_TO_DATE_TIME
message.locale: The From date time, %1z, must be on or before the To date time, %2z

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_FV_COMMENT_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_FV_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_RESERVATION_IS_NOT_ACTIVE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Reservation is '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_FROM_DATE_TIME_MUST_BE_LATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE_TIME
message.locale: Reservation From date time, %1z, must be later than current date time.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_PLACE_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_RESERVATION_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Place is not 'Available', reservation cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_PLACE_HAS_AN_END_DATE_IT_CANNOT_BE_USED_FOR_RESERVATION_WITHOUT_A_TO_DATE
message.locale: This place has an End Date, %1d, it cannot be used for a reservation without a To date.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_IS_NOT_ACTIVE_RESERVATION_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, is not 'Active', the reservation cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_PROVIDER_SERVICE_IS_NOT_APPROVED_RESERVATION_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The provider service, %1s, is not 'Approved', the reservation cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_SERVICE_OFFERING_NOT_VALID_FOR_PERIOD_RESERVATION_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, is not valid for the reservation period specified, the reservation cannot be created. The service period(s) are as follows: %2s.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_SERVICE_OFFERING_NOT_VALID_FOR_PERIOD_RESERVATION_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, is not valid for the reservation period specified, the reservation cannot be modified. The service period(s) are as follows: %2s.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_NOT_VALID_FOR_PERIOD_RESERVATION_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The provider, %1s, does not provide this service, %2s, for the reservation period specified, the reservation cannot be created. The provider service period(s) are as follows: %3s.

message.name: ERR_RESERVATION_XRV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_NOT_VALID_FOR_PERIOD_RESERVATION_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The provider, %1s, does not provide this service, %2s, for the reservation period specified, the reservation cannot be modified. The provider service period(s) are as follows: %3s.

message.locale: Place is not 'Available', reservation cannot be created.

message.locale: The client, %1s, is not an 'Active' case participant, the reservation cannot be created.
